hooks.command: [ "$(git branch --show-current)" = "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch"}' >&2; exit 2; }
cd /home/lc66/pwa/packages/frontend && npx prettier --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || echo 'Prettier not available, skipping'
cd /home/lc66/pwa/packages/frontend && npx eslint "$FILE_PATH" --fix 2>&1 || echo 'ESLint fix completed'
cd /home/lc66/pwa/packages/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit "$FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || echo 'TypeScript check completed'
